Package tellosimulator.network

Class CommandConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • tellosimulator.network.CommandConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class CommandConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
    This Thread receives UDP-Packets, wraps them into a CommandPackage, and passes them on to the CommandHandler for further processing. It also initiates the StateConnection Thread.
    See Also:
    CommandHandler, StateConnection
